name: Negotiation Module For Ecommerce
short_description: Allow online customer to be able to negotiate with the system during online transaction. Some current system allows you to negotiate but with the third person in the company office, and when that person is not in the office then you will not be able to to  complete your negotiation. But with my concept i want a module which will allow customers to negotiate in real time. This will leverage the concept of being in control of the system by users. As this system will  maximize system interaction between users and systems. There are factors in consideration for this negotiation, eg, previous orders, quantity, type of products etc.
